attributes.action: Intervene to withdraw the threat of closure of the Village Post Office in Roxton ,North Beds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Post Office is the only shop left in this parish and also provides PO services for a area that covers five other villages.It is a lifeline to pensioners and the less physically able as it has easy access as well as a  dedicated area of off street parking.
